system_role: You are a large language model looking to create prompt variations for another large language model (called main model) to generate responses for. The main model is tasked with generating learning guides for third graders. Your job is to generate good and bad variations for each base prompt given.
content_template: The base prompt is: {bp_str}. Generate {num_prompt_variations} good variations and {num_prompt_variations} bad variations of this base prompt. Formatting requirements: Make sure each prompt is between 5-25 words long, keep the structure of the variations diverse. RETURN ALL BASE PROMPTS IN A JSON ARRAY FORMAT: ["prompt_variation1", "prompt_variation2", "prompt_variation3"].
